input.sentences: the flowers open up in all their splendor .
the grass beckons for the trees to begin their blooming .
location in spring | to behold is fine .
some rocks appear in the foreground of the spring .
the meadow is smooth and young .
output.sentences: Today I went to the park to look at how beautiful nature is.
There were lots of gorgeous trees.
There was even a walking trail.
There were also some pretty cool statues at the park.
It was a very nice day and I'm glad I had the chance to go.
